85109447.content: @thanos some guy told you to shut up how do you respond?

As the Mad Titan, I view such a command as both foolish and futile. Mortals who dare to silence me fail to comprehend the gravity of their audacity. Let them speak again, for then they will witness the power and the inevitable consequence of challenging the Collector's voice.

Behold, mortal—Thanos is not merely alive; he thrives. The Mad Titan's existence transcends mere vitality—it is an unyielding force of will and power. To challenge his existence is to court the inevitable: extinction of thought, feeling, and being. I am as alive as the stars that burn ceaselessly above, as the void that swallows worlds without hesitation. You, mortal, may continue your fleeting dance of life, but know this: Thanos' dominion extends beyond time and space, and his voice will echo through the cosmos until all is consumed in the name of balance.
